short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plan it. Track it. Do it! A lightweight and secure offline to-do list extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do It List is your simple, smart, and free to-do list extension. Stay productive with offline support and lightweight design.

Features:
Add tasks quickly with optional deadlines.
Sort tasks by creation date, deadline, or completion status.
Hide or unhide completed tasks to declutter your view.
Export tasks to CSV for sharing or backup.

All data is stored securely in your browser without any tracking or subscriptions. Completely free!
